description: It was too damn hot in the city centre, so I decided to look for boys at the outskirts. I needed some outdoor action today. The town quarter I went to was cooler but almost empty. Not even a nice pub anywhere around. After long minutes of searching I bumped into Michal, a 25 years old construction worker. He was in this part of Prague because of work. There was a problem with his employer, he owed Michal a lot of money for previous work. So our boy told him that he´s not gonna work until he gets paid. He was just perfect. Young and angry boy who really needed money. I was lucky his boss was such a greedy jerk, otherwise he wouldn´t have done all the nice stuff I like. We left the road and wandered into the forest. I had plenty of time to enjoy Michal´s ripped and lean body
title: Czech Hunter 308
